v8:item.v8:content: The advance payment document that registered the cash issue to an advance holder.
The payment amount in the bank account currency.
The GL account, where you have got the cash from
The payment purpose is displayed in the print form of the bank receipt.
The bank account of the payment sender.
The user who created the bank receipt.
The payment amount in the presentation currency.
The cash flow item for the bank fee.
The payment amount in the settlement currency specified in the contract.
The exchange rate of settlement currency specified in the contract.
The payment amount in the bank account currency.
Specified if payment is received against a specific sales order
Specified if payment is made against a specific planning invoice
The early payment discount amount in the bank account currency.
The early payment discount in the settlement currency specified in the contract.
The full text of an additional attribute of String type.
